about_the_game:
SUCK WITH STYLE. BLOW WITH PURPOSE.

Take control of ACUVAC — a physics-driven canister vacuum with a mind of its own — in a destructive cleaning adventure. Use your hose to suck up, blow away, and manipulate the world around you in unexpected ways. Uncover and clean every corner of this whimsical, robot-run world where chaos is all part of the fun!

Gameplay Inspired by:

  • Katamari Damacy – Engage in playful, large-scale object interaction paired with satisfying physics-based gameplay

  • Luigi’s Mansion – Use precision suction and airflow mechanics to manipulate the environment, collect objects, and unlock secrets

  • Octodad: Dadliest Catch – Control a flexible, limb-like hose that bends and twists through obstacles with surprising precision

What You’ll Do:

  • CLEAN:
    Vacuum trash, smash objects, and creatively interact with environments to complete objectives — or go beyond and super-clean for bigger rewards

  • COLLECT:
    Unlock new levels, arcade machines, and quirky cosmetics by earning medals and discovering hidden collectibles

  • CONQUER:
    Master every challenge across varied sandbox levels, taking on unique challenges and unlocking special bonus modes, with plenty of surprises to uncover

WISHLIST IT!

Experience one of the most creative, chaotic, and satisfying physics-based adventures. Add ACUVAC: A Suck and Blow Adventure to your Wishlist today and get ready to turn cleaning into chaos!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-530 (2 * 2930) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 440 (1024 MB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 (2 * 3600) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 (2048 MB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: ACUVAC: A Suck and Blow Adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-530 (2 * 2930) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 440 (1024 MB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 (2 * 3600) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 (2048 MB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Suck! Blow! Swing your hose around! Become ACUVAC, the world's most chaotic canister vacuum, in this physics-based action-adventure. Smash, clean, and overachieve your way through ridiculous challenges in a robot-run world. Cleaning has never been this messy—or this much fun!
